page.title: 03Extra-curricular Activities
page.content: We have a swimming pool 13 x 5 metres. Each class has a go in turn to go in the pool in the warmer weather. Only 20 children are allowed in the pool at once so some have to sit out. Up on the school field we have two pieces of playing apparatus - a slide and a climbing frame, both made out of wood. The money for them came from money we raised through holding a 70 mile walk, and a Sponsored Tables Test. Every year we hold a School Sports, A May Day Celebration, Carol Service, Christmas Concert, Harvest Festival, Open Evenings and an End of Term Ceremony. After school activities include - netball, recorders, gymn club, football, cycling proficiency, computer club, softball, swimming and cricket. We raise money for Action Aid and the school helps a boy in India.
